title: CORS-safelisted response header
summary: A CORS-safelisted response header is an HTTP header in a CORS response that it is considered safe to expose to client scripts. Only safelisted response headers are made available to web pages.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
